{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.23780v1", "title": "Computing algebraic Belyi functions on Bring's curve", "summary": "In this paper, we explicitly compute two kinds of algebraic Belyi functions
on Bring's curve. One is related to a congruence subgroup of ${\rm
SL}_2(\mathbb{Z})$ and the other is relate to a congruence subgroup of the
triangle group $\Delta(2,4,5)\subset {\rm SL}_2(\mathbb{R})$. To carry out the
computation, we use elliptic cusp forms of weight 2 for the former case while
the automorphism group of Bring's curve for the latter case. We also discuss a
suitable base field (a number field) for isomorphisms between Hulek-Craig's
curve, Bring's curve, and its another algebraic model obtained as a modular
curve.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,math.AG,math.CV", "published": "2025-03-31T06:53:56Z"}
